text: zai difang shang gengjia zi da, gengjia tumoubugui. Yinmou zhi kun qi chuangzuo zhe, tamen chule dengdai guren suo zaoshou de changdao wai, hai neng dengdai shenme ne? Duiyu zhenzhu de changdao, ni jue buneng faxian renhe biangeng; duiyu zhenzhu de changdao, ni jue buneng faxian renhe bianqian.
